name: SENTINEL (itch) (JesusAcHe)
description:
LDJAM 44 Submission.

In this short, random and possibly super unbalanced roguelike, you play a Sentinel bot, tasked with clearing several areas of all possible enemies. However your ammo and your life are tied together, so upgrading, shooting and receiving damage all may lead to your ultimate fate.


CONTROLS:

  • WASD -> movement
  • MOUSE -> Aim and shoot
  • Q -> Equip found items
  • E -> Toggle between equipped weapons
  • ESC -> Pause

Tools:

  • Code -> Game Maker Studio 2
  • Graphics ->Photoshop & Krita
  • Music -> Music Jam Maker
  • SFX -> BFXR
  • Fonts made by Eeve (https://somepx.itch.io/) and YellowAfterlife (https://yellowafterlife.itch.io/). Used under license agreement.
